channel.description: Recent content in plot on werk.statt.codes

item.title: Mail votes at the Austrian General Elections in 2019
item.description: Context Here’s another quick post on the results of the recent general elections in Austria. It goes without saying that there has been already a flurry of analyses, visualisations etc on it and there is hardly much new to add. Nevertheless, below a few library(tidyverse) nrw19_imp <- readr::read_csv2(file = file, locale=locale(encoding="latin1")) %>% janitor::remove_empty(., which=c("cols")) %>% janitor::clean_names() %>% rename(gkz=x1) nrw19 <- nrw19_imp %>% filter(str_detect(gkz, "00$|99$")) %>% filter(!str_detect(gkz, ".{2}[A-Z].*")) %>% #remove aggregates of regional electoral districts filter(!

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is a new R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
